title: Divya Chandrahaar Tikka: Ruby & Diamond Embellished Forehead Ornament
materials: 22K Gold. Features a vibrant Ruby cabochon centerpiece surrounded by brilliant-cut CZ diamonds. Finished with handcrafted gold bead dangles.
features: Classic Chandrahaar design with a crescent-shaped motif. Fine floral detailing embellished with sparkling CZ diamonds. Features traditional 'gutti pusalu' (beaded strands) style golden dangles that add movement and elegance. The central ruby cabochon adds a touch of royalty and sophistication.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant white CZ diamonds and a rich red ruby. The warm golden tone enhances the luster of the gemstones.
occasions: or any traditional Telugu ceremony. Adds a regal touch to bridal attire or festive occasions such as Ugadi and Sankranthi. Can be worn as a statement piece for formal events.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this Tikka showcases exceptional attention to detail and a dedication to preserving South Indian jewelry traditions. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The use of CZ diamonds provides a stunning sparkle at an accessible price point.
